name: heal-bell
effect: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user's party.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user makes a soothing bell chime
to heal the status problems of all the
party Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Chimes soothingly to heal
all status abnormalities.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Chimes soothingly to heal
all status abnormalities.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:

chimes to heal the
status problems of
all allies.
